programme.title: ONE Championship: Age Of Dragons (Beijing) - EP 26
programme.desc: (Delayed) ONE Championship is a celebration of true martial arts and its deep-rooted Asian values of humility, integrity, respect, honor, kindness, discipline, courage, and strength. Martial arts has been Asia's greatest cultural treasure for the last 5,000 years, and is a part of the daily fabric of society across the continent. Asia is home to the best martial artists on the planet. Our mission is to unleash real life superheroes who ignite Asia with hope, dreams, inspiration and strength.

programme.title: The Rainbow Bus - EP 19
programme.desc: Today's chosen topic is Art and the kids are at the Pottery Centre for their first stop of the day. Then put on your dancing shoes and join our adventurers at the tap dancing school! Mister D brings them to the Art Museum for their final stop.

programme.title: Bugsville - EP 9
programme.desc: Bugsville is an entertaining and educational pre-school programme featuring NATALIE, her parents (Mary and Fred) and her friends. The show will feature live action filmed in home sets as well as composited CGI shot in a green screen studio.

programme.title: My Friends Tigger & Pooh S2 - EP 32
programme.desc: WINNIE THE POOH, TIGGER and the gang have a new friend - an adorable six-year-old girl named DARBY - joining them for new adventures in the Hundred Acre Wood.

programme.title: Timmy Time S3 - EP 0025 & 0026
programme.desc: Each episode follows a day in the life of Timmy and his friends in Nursery.

programme.desc: New season of Sesame Street.

programme.title: Sesame Street S47 - EP 19
programme.desc: New season of Sesame Street.

programme.title: New Ben 10 Special - EP 1
programme.desc: The all-new Ben 10 animated series re-introduces the energetic, fun-loving, 10-year-old Ben Tennyson, with new and fan-favorite aliens. The series kicks off with the adventures of Ben, his cousin Gwen, and Grandpa Max as they travel the country during summer vacation.

programme.title: New Ben 10 Special - EP 2
programme.desc: The all-new Ben 10 animated series re-introduces the energetic, fun-loving, 10-year-old Ben Tennyson, with new and fan-favorite aliens. The series kicks off with the adventures of Ben, his cousin Gwen, and Grandpa Max as they travel the country during summer vacation.

programme.title: Zoids WILD - EP 33
programme.desc: Continuing adventures of Arashi in his quest to become a Zoid Hunter and find his ultimate Partner.

programme.title: Turning Mecard - EP 23
programme.desc: Jason loves the mystical minicars he hears so much about. One day, he meets Evan, a real living minicar that transforms into a creature called Mecanimal. Mecanimals are from a different world called Triforce, and have special powers to battle each other. Jason and Evan bond and realise they both need one another to find missing family members. Their quest will take them on an amazing adventure!

programme.title: Extreme Football - EP 21
programme.desc: Extreme Football is an urban spin off of traditional five-a-side incorporating elements of free running and acrobatics. Created by and for children, as soon as Samy discovers it he is determined to captain a team. He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S4 - EP 4
programme.desc: The Turtles face Shredder's new deadly assassin and uncover a new Kraang plot. They'll also encounter more mutants, discover more about the mysterious Kraang species, and venture into new realms.

programme.title: Me, Myself & Isaac! - EP 6
programme.desc: Isaac cajoles Sporty and Smarty to join (re: cheat!) a grueling Hands On A Car contest. But it turns out that the three aren't the only ones cheating in order to win themselves the big $5000 prize. Meanwhile, a snooping Cik Kamisah is determined to get to the bottom of things and find evidence proving that Isaac has two clones living with him!

programme.title: No Place Like Home - EP 3
programme.desc: As Singaporeans get older, financial stability becomes a key factor in their decision-making. See how the Lees - an elderly couple in the midst of retirement, learns of how to use the HDB's tools to set themselves for an income for life whilst never having to give up the flat they call home.

programme.title: The Australian Ballet: The Sleeping Beauty
programme.desc: The Australian Ballets Artistic Director, David McAllister, has created a sumptuous new production of this timeless classic, with lavish sets and costumes by award-winning designer Gabriela Tylesova. Set to Tchaikovskys sublime score, this enchanting production casts a spell of delight all the way to true loves kiss.

programme.title: Odd Squad 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Odd Squad is a high-tech agency run by kids equipped with the world's most advanced and unpredictable gadgetry. The agents investigate weird and unusual phenomena around them and use math to put things right.

programme.title: Pound Puppies 2 - EP 13
programme.desc: The mission of a team of fearless dogs is to find homes for puppies in need. Their motto is A pup for every person and a person for every pup.

programme.title: Bat Pat - EP 0013 & 0014
programme.desc: Bat Pat and his human friends seek to unravel the mysteries of the scary creatures that lurk about in Fogville, always discovering that the supernatural characters aren't evil - just loveable and misunderstood! Based on the best-selling book franchise.

programme.title: President's Star Charity 2019
programme.desc: The President's Star Charity (PSC) aims to galvanise the community to support the President's Challenge. In its 26th year, PSC 2019 appeals to viewers to be the change that they want to see, reminding Singaporeans that it takes all of us, working together, to create a positive impact on the lives of the less fortunate. To drive home this message, we've assembled a stellar line-up of artistes to rally as many people as possible in a bid to contribute to the empowerment of those in need.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A selfish prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner. Starring Emma Watson and Dan Stevens.

programme.title: News 5
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: MasterChef Singapore (Specials) - EP 2
programme.desc: (Encore) The world's greatest cooking competition is back in Singapore with a heartfelt twist. Teaming up with the President's Challenge & Social Service Agencies, the 2 part special MasterChef episodes is all about helping those who yearn a lucky break. Leading the charge are Season 1 favourites as they mentor 4 rookies looking for a shot in the F&B industry.

programme.title: Cesar's Recruit: Asia S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: World renowned animal guru, Cesar Millan, is on a mission to find the next rising "Dog Whisperer" of Asia and is offering 8 aspiring "Recruits" the chance of a lifetime. Cesar's Recruit is a reality-based competition series which focuses on each contestant's ability to implement Cesar's strategies while working with dogs that possess behavioural issues.

programme.title: Wild City Rescue - EP 5

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 6
programme.desc: Along the Laotian banks of the mighty Mekong are pockets of underprivileged, isolated and mosquito-infested villages. The people here live a subsistence lifestyle and apart from the river, have no access to the outside world. There are no roads, no cars, no phones, no internet and no distributed electricity. Host Carla Dunareanu partners with Bridging the Gap Mekong Trust to travel upriver to a remote village in her special delivery of mosquito-nets and precious medical supplies.

Kongli asks Baida, who is a hopeless gambler, to impersonate Tietong so as to keep Kaixin under his control. Kaixin falls for the sham and believes that Tietong has reincarnated. In order to maintain a stable income, she has to continue to work in Singapore as a part-time lecturer to advance her cause. What were some of the sacrifices she had to make to juggle between work and family. (重)33岁的本地视觉艺术家赵敏和印尼籍丈夫与女儿居住在巴厘岛上。岛上要靠艺术维持生计原本就不易，但为了助人，夫妻俩还是坚持创办了不赚钱的社会企业Ketemu。他们用艺术去扶持当地的弱势群体，特别是一群被边缘化的精神分裂症患者。当他们默默在为公益献力时，经济出现了危机，赵敏不得不回来新加坡工作。为了赚钱，她不只得和丈夫、女儿分隔两地，同时还要经营社会企业，赵敏如何兼顾？.

programme.title: 118 II 118 S2 - EP 26
programme.desc: (R) Ji Zhou's brother Ya Zhou returns from Hong Kong with his girlfriend Yi Yi. Man Man gives Ya Zhou a tongue lashing while his brother was in the bathroom. Ya Zhou mistakes Man Man for his brother's girlfriend which angers Man Man even more. Ya Zhou claims that he has graduated from a renowned university in the United States and will soon be able to repay the debt owed to his brother. (PG)(重)际洲的弟弟亚洲带女友依依从香港回来，际洲在冲凉，慢慢代他痛骂亚洲一顿。亚洲以为慢慢是际洲的女人，连声称呼大嫂，更令慢慢火冒三丈。亚洲说自己在美国念的虽是野鸡大学，但仍旧会让人另眼相看，很快就能偿还际洲花在他身上的钱。.

programme.title: 大家一起来做饭! I Can Cook Too! - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) The topic of this episode is rice. Under the guidance of host Ben, a pair of sister and brother learn to cook omurice with microwave. (重)这一集的食物主题是米饭！姐弟俩在主持人的教导下，学习使用微波炉烹煮日式蛋包饭。他们也前往本地农场，当起“小小农夫"，体验插秧收割的过程。最后，成功完成任务的两人也获得食材，煮出一道简易版的海南鸡饭！.

programme.title: 三生三世十里桃花 Eternal Love - EP 41

programme.title: 万福楼 Bountiful Blessings - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Fuxi and Dong Hai run into a robber. Dong Hai gets stabbed and suddenly regains his sense of taste. However, he feels that it is Fuxi who has helped him regain his senses. He vows to start anew and cook good dishes again. In a drunken stupor, Er Hu tells Dong Hai he wants to give Wan Fu Lou and Fuxi to him, leaving Dong Hai feeling very awkward. (重)福喜和东海遭到抢劫，东海为了救福喜而被砍了一刀。东海经此刺激，恢复了味觉，但他深知真正令他消除心理障碍的人是福喜。东海决定重新振作，煮出美味的一餐，恢复以前的水准。二虎借着醉意，说要把万福楼和福喜交给东海，令东海尴尬不已。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 266
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 祖先保佑2 Blessings 2 - EP 19
programme.desc: (R) As Sai Ding owes loan shark money when opening a new shop in Malaysia, he has no choice but to borrow money from Xue Geng. At the same time, Master Tian is also asking for Xue Geng's help to settle his huge gambling debts. Xue Geng is in a dilemma, after advice from Guo Fuhao and Jue Hui, he decides to help Master Tian first, and this makes Sai Ding split with him. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)赛鼎在联邦与人合资开分店，却因为出状况而欠下高利贷，被迫拉下脸向学庚借钱。正好田师傅也因欠下巨额赌债，需要学庚帮助。学庚左右为难，后听取郭富豪与觉慧的建议，决定将借来的钱给田师傅应急。赛鼎因此与学庚决裂。.

programme.title: 老友万岁 Old Is Gold - EP 125

(PG)Hugo与向荣约在天台见面，原来向荣一直在暗地里帮Hugo调查千岁之家发生的种种事情，同时也在收集美芳犯罪的证据，两人决定开始进行下一步计划。俊阳听说美芳打算将千岁之家的地皮卖掉，质问美芳……。.

programme.title: 极件任务 Mission Delivery - EP 2
programme.desc: More than a million exotic flowers and rare plants are being exhibited in Gardens by the Bay. However, have you ever wondered how they were delivered to Singapore? In this episode, we will look into the overseas transplantation and delivery project that Gardens deal with in their everyday business. 滨海湾花园园区里有多达150万棵植物展出，其中不少来自海外。但你可曾想过，这些奇花异草是如何被引进到我国的呢？这次滨海湾准备进口一棵百年老树，这项繁复浩大的工程背后，又隐藏着哪些不为人知的艰辛和挑战？.

programme.title: 星期二特写 - 我就是我 Tuesday Report - Be Myself - EP 5
programme.desc: "Be Myself" is an 8 episode series produced by Tuesday Report, revealing stories of a group of young adults aged 35 years and below. Every individual has their own characteristics and beliefs. Each of them are passionate about lives, and hold unique opinions about the society. They are not afraid to face new challenges, and are determined to realise their dreams. The series aims to explore how the attitudes and values of these young adults shaped who they are today. “星期二特写”八集系列《我就是我》，讲述一群三十五岁以下年轻人的精彩故事。这群年轻人有个性，有特色，有想法，对生活充满热情，对社会有独特见解，并且勇于面对生活挑战，敢于追逐自己的梦想。节目探讨年轻人的态度与价值观，看看他们如何打造自己的人生，创造一条与众不同的道路。.

programme.title: 致胜出击 The Good Fight - EP 2

Dongshan inevitably finds out about the broken wooden dummy and flares up. (PG)正斌无意间打坏了逸风留下的木人桩，逸晨为了隐瞒东山，急忙拉他出去看医生，舒雅则帮忙正斌一起修补木人桩。两人回忆年少时与逸风在一起的那些快乐时光，感慨万分。纸包不住火，东山还是发现了木人桩被打坏，勃然大怒！.

(重)发现大丝路是一个横跨欧亚非三大洲的大型文化旅游节目，主持人廖科溢从中国西安出发，走过充满伊斯兰风情的北方丝路，穿越蜀身毒道，看见南方丝路文化，最后寻郑和下西洋的路线见证海上丝路的辉煌。.

He suddenly recalls that the nickname 'Soft-legged dragon' was given by Mei You to him. (PG)(重)金龙当年虽然有叫律师办离婚，却不知有没有办成，所以决定立遗嘱，确保死后一切都归慢慢，慢慢说不会让他那么早死。金龙和慢慢到新要要发，听见张没友的名字，金龙觉得熟悉，猛然想起自己"软脚龙"的外号正是张没友取的….

Dafeng is upset that a small misunderstanding caused their break-up. Fuxi tells him to treasure Pin Hong. (重)大丰将当年Jess故意破坏的事告诉福喜，福喜却说她早就知道。当年她因此事跑去喝酒，结果遇到单一，两人铸下大错。福喜发现自己怀孕，才决定悔婚。大丰很遗憾一场小小的误会竟演变成这样的结果，福喜安慰，要他珍惜品红。.

Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 祖先保佑2 Blessings 2 - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Sai Wen died of dystocia, unfortunately. Xue Geng was shocked when he learned from Chun Xian that the child is his kindred, Jue Hui felt sorry towards what happened to Xue Geng and Sai Wen, and she decided to bring the child up with Xue Geng. Xue Geng named his child "Wen Ding" in memory of Sai Ding and Sai Wen. Da Xi realizes that his grandfather's biological mother was actually Sai Wen... (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)赛文不幸难产而死，学庚从春仙口中得知赛文生下的是自己的骨肉，震惊不已。觉慧怜惜学庚与赛文被人所害，决定与学庚一起把孩子抚养成人。学庚把孩子取名文鼎，以纪念赛鼎和赛文。大喜恍然祖父的亲生母亲竟是赛文……。.

programme.title: 午餐吃什么 What's For Lunch? - EP 8
programme.desc: "What's for Lunch?" joins Shaun Chen and Yao Wenlong at a Bak Kut Teh restaurant situated in Tiong Bahru. Shaun and family come here often for meals so what other dishes can he recommend to us? We also travel to Johor Bahru to try Rice Soup prepared by Wenlong! How will it taste?We also meet up with hunks and buddies Lawrence Wong and Chuando as they enjoy European cuisine at the picturesque Gardens by the Bay. What do they have to say about the food? Don't miss our final episode! “午餐吃什么？”两位实力派演员陈泓宇和姚彣隆来到中峇鲁吃肉骨茶，泓宇一家人是这里的常客，他们最爱哪几道菜呢？为了品尝彣隆的拿手招牌泡饭，主持人特地来到马来西亚新山！到底味道有何惊喜？节目下半场，高颜值的陈传多和王冠逸是认识多年的好友，注重饮食的两人推荐这家位于滨海湾花园的欧式餐馆，这里的菜有何特色？千万别错过最后一集的精彩内容！.

programme.title: 致胜出击 The Good Fight - EP 3
programme.desc: Zhengbin apologizes to Dongshan but he refuses to accept it and even beats him up. Yichen appears in the nick of time to stop Dongshan. Zhengbin feels comforted as Yichen helps to apply medication on his wounds. He recalls how Dongshan has saved him from being bullied when he was young, and is grateful to Dongshan for taking him in as his disciple. He has since regarded Dongshan as his father. (PG)正斌向东山道歉，东山不接受，生气地对正斌拳打脚踢，正斌不敢还手，幸好逸晨及时出现，劝阻东山。逸晨帮正斌敷药，正斌感温暖。正斌想起年少无依的自己被不良少年欺负，是东山救了他，还收他为徒。正斌铭感于心，视东山为父亲。.

programme.desc: (R) Caiyue (flower fairy) was cheated by nine-tail vixen and caused the death of Tangseng. Su Wukong was devastated and swore never forgive Caiyue forever! Caiyue pleads the Goddess of mercy for leniency. Sensing her sincere repentance, the Goddess grants her a time frame of a thousand years, to allow Caiyue to ask for Su Wukong's forgiveness and reverses the whole incident. (PG)(重)采月（花仙子）受九尾狐所惑，导致唐僧惨死西天取经路上。孙悟空悲痛不已，立誓永世不原谅采月！采月向观音菩萨苦求，菩萨大发慈悲，赐于她一千年时限，让她寻找转世孙悟空，求得对方谅解，扭转乾坤。转眼来到时限最后一年，采月在土地公协助下，找到转世悟空赵耀进……。.

(重)嘟嘟糕的由来得追溯到上个世纪年代，一群从福建南来的陈姓先辈，共同将家乡美食——松糕，改良成如今的嘟嘟糕。嘟嘟糕师傅陈金辉，今年六十五岁，自小和姐姐陈金兰，跟随父亲身边，学习制作嘟嘟糕。陈金辉师傅从10岁起，便开始在武吉士一带沿街叫卖。如今，师傅的儿女都无意继承这项手艺，那相传超越50年的嘟嘟糕秘方，还可以传给谁呢？.

programme.title: 异口同声 Who Is The Real Singer - EP 7

programme.title: 美食世家 2 Food Empire 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Cupcakes, cookies and macaroons are mainstays but if you prefer something traditional, there's more to teatime in Singapore than coffee and cakes. Kuehs have always been around to answer teatime's beckoning. From Ang Ku Kueh to Putu Mayam, Episode 5 is all about these teatime treasures. (重).

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) This episode, hosts Pornsak and Cui Fang head to Taiwan, Japan and Malaysia respectively to explore the brewing process of Taiwanese black bean soy sauce, understand the fermenting process of Japanese miso, tasting of the Shizuoka Crown Melon and discover the secret of rearing chicken in Malaysia. (重)在这一集的节目中，主持人Pornsak和林翠芳分别前往台湾、日本和马来西亚，一探台湾黑豆酱油的酿造过程，了解日本味噌的发酵熟成过程，品尝天价日本静冈网纹蜜瓜的滋味，发掘马来西亚肉鸡的养殖奥秘。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) In India, 75% of the nation's health-related infrastructure, manpower and resources are concentrated in urban areas, serving only less than 30% of the population. Joanna Dong treks to the most remote, hilly areas of Darjeeling to investigate how the locals cope with the healthcare crisis. (重)在印度，住在大城市的30%人口，垂手即可享有全国高达75%的医疗资源。董姿彦前往海拔2300米的大吉岭山区，去了解住在交通不便的山村乡民们面对基本医疗需求，还有紧急医疗救助时，他们该向谁求助？.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 53

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 58
programme.desc: (R) Ruli flares up when she discovers that Wulie has taken Xiaochun away to save Jiaya in the hospital. She decides to bring Xiaochun overseas to keep her away from Zhiyuan. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)发现武烈把小春带去医院救嘉亚, 如莉动怒, 她打算带小春出国,避开智媛.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 2 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 2 - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) This food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. (重)美食节目介绍有特色的台湾料理，也同时披露每道菜肴背后的感人故事。.

programme.title: 十大新加坡 Top 10 Singapore - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) What do Singaporeans look for in a dream job? Is it stability and good income? Does being able to travel and see the world matter more? Or contributing to the larger good is of greater importance? This brand-new talk show showcases unique views of the Singaporean approach to career choices! (重)很多人总是坐一山望另一山，羡慕别人有好工作。你最羡慕的工作又是什么？安稳实在重要？衣食无忧不可缺？还是环游世界天天精彩最爽？又或是具使命感更伟大？全新谈话性节目《10大新加坡》带你一窥国人选择职业背后的各种独特考量！.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Zhen-ai's mother, Shanyu, has always favoured her older brother, Hengkui. Zhen-ai is unhappy and wants to move out of the house as soon as possible. However, just as Zhen-ai is finally able to move into her dream apartment, her father, Dongchu is cheated of a big sum of money. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)李真爱从小就觉得母亲林珊玉偏爱哥哥亨奎。真爱长期被母亲忽略，在家里不开心，想尽早搬出去住。真爱好不容易筹到钱租下梦想的单位，父亲李东出却在这时被朋友骗光了钱。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) A distressed Fengshun receives a text message from Changxian and goes out to meet him alone. As the elevator fell on Jingxin who is tied on the shelf, Fengshun raced forwards to hold the elevator right before it crushed Jingxin. But Fengshun tossed the elevator away carelessly and hurt an innocent security guard. Instantly, her superhuman strength is gone. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)苦恼的奉顺接到长贤的短信，单独前去赴约。奉顺在救被绑在货架下面的京心时， 伤害了无辜的人，一瞬间失去了所有的力量。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 59
programme.desc: Haizhu overheard Zhiyuan reveal that Ruli's father, Sun Zhuhao, is still alive. Jiaya is in critical condition, Haizhu pleads with Ruli to help her save Jiaya. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)海珠偷听到如莉父亲孙柱浩还活着,大吃一惊.嘉亚情况危急, 海珠求如莉尽快救嘉亚.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 60
programme.desc: Learning that Jiaya is critically ill, Xiaochun agrees to donate her bone marrow to save him. While fetching Xiaochun to the hospital, Ruli receives news about her father and turns back. Haizhu sees Ruli detour and misunderstood that she changed her mind about saving Jiaya. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)小春愿意捐骨髓救嘉亚。当如莉带小春去医院途中接到父亲消息便反回路线，海珠以为如莉改变心意。.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 4
programme.desc: This episode, Pornsak heads to Lake Hamana in Japan to learn about eel farming and takes a look at rice farming technology in Shizuoka. He is back to his hometown to learn about the cultivation of Thai jasmine rice. Cui Fang heads to Pontian, Malaysia to learn about local offshore fishing operation. 在这一集的节目中，Pornsak前往日本滨松市滨名湖了解鳗鱼养殖。他也前往静冈一窥日本的水稻种植技术，再回到故乡泰国了解茉莉香米的种植。而林翠芳则前往马来西亚笨珍，了解当地渔民的近海捕捞作业。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 10
programme.desc: Zaiyi tells Jihao that Wenshu is not the upright judge that he thinks she is and also tells him that Wenshu is related to Xianzhu's disappearance. Jihao thinks Zaiyi has been brainwashed by Shangbi and wants her to leave his law firm. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)在伊听说文淑约见基浩，终于跟基浩说文淑不是他心目中的好律师，还说文淑跟贤珠的失踪案有关。基浩认为在伊已经被尚弼洗脑，命令在伊立刻离开尚弼及他的事务所。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) The worm incident severely affected the business at Nanyang eatery. Tai Hu disclosed that Hao Lun is the traitor who took his money and betrayed the Nanyang eatery. Hao Lun tried to defend himself in vain. Tai Long was very hurt. The cohesive team that they once were became a thing of the past. (PG)(重)小吃店生意再陷低潮，美薇找来知名食评品尝店里的招牌美食，怎知试吃过程被泰龙搞砸。泰虎揭发浩伦就是出卖小吃店的内鬼。浩伦百口莫辩，泰龙失望又难过。本来四人组成的团队，变成了一盘散沙。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Malta is known as the heart of the Mediterranean and a transiting centre for African and Middle Eastern refugees who were desperately fleeing to Europe in early years. Malta has accepted these refugees since 2002. Let's follow the fixer to find out about these refugees and listen to their stories. (重)有地中海心脏之称的马耳他，是欧洲游客的度假胜地。早年曾是非洲和中东难民越洋出逃，汲汲登陆欧洲的中转站。自零二年开始，马尔他就接受这一批批的难民，让我们随线人准备踏上这条难民课题的列车，聆听他们的故事。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Zhen-ai wants Hengkui to help Dongchu financially, but Hengkui claims that he does not have the means to. Shanyu blames Zhen-ai for spoiling everyone's mood on Hengkui's birthday. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真爱知道东出又闯祸后，要亨奎出钱帮助家人，但亨奎却说他没钱，真爱于是跟他大吵一架。珊玉责怪真爱在亨奎生日当天让大家不开心。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) Changxian goes to Minhe's company as a reporter and kidnaps Fengshun. Changxian straps a bomb on Fengshun and chains her to the door of the exhaust pipe room on the top floor. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)长贤以记者的身分来到敏赫的公司，绑架了奉顺。长贤在奉顺身上绑了一枚炸弹，将她锁在顶楼的排气管间里。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 61
programme.desc: Though Xiaochun reaches the hospital in time, Jiaya had unfortunately passed on. Daoying is shocked to learn that Cui Meixi is Jiaya's donor and is back for Haizhu. Haizhu vows to take revenge on Ruli over Jiaya's death. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)即使小春赶到医院，嘉亚等不了不幸去世。崔美熙是嘉亚的捐献者令道英吃惊，同时她也声称为海珠而回来的。对嘉亚的过世，海珠要向如莉报仇。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 62
programme.desc: Zhiyuan warns Cui Meixi not to see Haizhu. Haizhu kidnaps Zhuhao, who has amnesia, to stop him from seeing Ruli. She is shocked when Zhuhao reveals that Ruli is Zhiyuan's biological daughter. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛警告美熙不要接近海珠。海珠软禁患有失忆症的柱浩，避免他与如莉见面。听到柱浩说出如莉是智媛的女儿，大感震惊。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 7
programme.desc: In China, 1 in every 13 Chinese is potentially down on depression. Jojo Goh visits a youth centre in Beijing that runs a boot camp-like program for depressed youths, and an organisation in Hangzhou that relies on a personal support network. What is the biggest obstacle in the fight against depression? 数据显示，中国有将近1亿名忧郁症患者。每13名中国人当中，就有一人患病。吴俐璇亲访北京一家帮助青少年患者的青年康复中心，也前去杭州了解推动心理健康的慈善组织如何进行科普，说服更多中国患者及时求医。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 11
programme.desc: Daxiong is uncooperative when Wuzhou wants him to bring Shangbi out of Seoul. Guangdong lures Shangbi to a high-rise building where Shangbi witnesses Daxiong's death. Shangbi is charged with Daxiong's murder. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)五洲要大雄把尚弼带离首尔，大雄却不肯合作。冠东把大雄弄晕后拨电给尚弼。尚弼赶到时，想抓住即将坠楼的大雄，却无能为力。大雄身亡，尚弼被控谋杀。.

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Volunteers often leave their creature comforts for unfamiliar environments. They seek to improve the lives of others, and in doing so, they unknowingly altered their lives, as well. What hardships do they face and are they mentally prepared for this journey? (重)为了改善别人的生活，许多义工不惜从舒适圈出走，去到陌生、落后的国度。很多人都没有想到，在改变别人以前，他们首先改变了自己的人生。当踌躇满志的义工踏上柬埔寨这片千疮百孔的土地传递温暖的时候，做了什么心理准备？又面对了什么挑战？.

programme.title: 吃。东西 World Food - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) The method of using salt to marinate fish in the East and West is quite similar. Be it air-dried, canned, eaten directly or cooked, each has its own flavour. This episode, Guo Liang, Axian and Pornsak introduce the production and ways of eating salted fish and marinated fish from the East and West. (重)东西方以盐腌制鱼类的方法大同小异，不管是风干或是晾干，做成罐头还是旋吊晾卖，直接食用还是烹煮做菜，各有不同风味，异曲同工，异中求同。郭亮，阿贤和Pornsak会为我们介绍东西方盐腌制鱼类的制作与吃法。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Zhen-ai finds out that Shanyu wants to end her business for Hengkui's sake. Zhen-ai understands how important the business is for Shanyu. She thus decides not to rent an apartment and instead uses the money to help Shanyu continue with her business. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真爱发现珊玉为了亨奎，要结束小菜店的生意。真爱明白小菜店对珊玉的重要性，于是取消租约，把贷款回来的钱交给房东，让珊玉继续经营小菜店。.

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) Fengshun goes over to Minhe's house and makes breakfast for the two hungover men. After breakfast, the three begin to discuss the plan to arrest Changxian even as Changxian is placed on a nationwide most-wanted alert. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)奉顺来敏赫家，为两个喝醉酒的男人做早餐。吃完了早饭，敏赫，国斗与奉顺三个人开始讨论如何逮捕长贤。警察厅也已经发布了实名通缉令。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 63
programme.desc: Zhiyuan is surprised to see Daozhi and Ruli together with Cui Meixi in the office. Haizhu realizes that Zhuhao adopted Ruli from young and Zhiyuan is biologically related to Ruli from the DNA report. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)在公司里，智媛很惊讶看到道治和如莉认识崔美熙。从亲子报告海珠发现如莉从小就被柱浩令养而智媛是如莉亲生母亲。.

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 64
programme.desc: Ruli informs Daozhi that Zhiyuan has another daughter beside Haizhu. Daoying tells Haizhu that Cui Meixi is her biological mother but Haizhu could not accept the fact. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)如莉告知道治处了海珠之外，智媛还有一个女儿当下落不明。道英透露给海珠崔美熙是她的亲生母亲，海珠无法接受事实。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 2
programme.desc: Each missing person represents a broken family. According to statistics from the Taiwan Police Department, Taiwan has nearly 25,000 people reported missing and more than 200 unknown bodies have been uncovered every year. Why do people go missing in Taiwan? 每一名失踪人口，代表一个破碎家庭。根据台湾警政署资料统计，台湾平均每年通报受理将近2万5千起失踪人口，两百多具无名尸体被发现的案例。茫茫人海，寻人好比大海捞针，怎么可能容易？.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 12
programme.desc: Daxiong's murder case starts legal proceedings. The witness arranged by Guangdong claims to have seen Shangbi murdered Daxiong, but loses his footing when he is questioned by Zaiyi. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)崔大雄命案第一次公审。目击证人是冠东安排的。目击证人坚称他看到尚弼杀人，但被在伊盘问后露出破绽。.

programme.desc: (R) Ruli informs Daozhi that Zhiyuan has another daughter beside Haizhu. Daoying tells Haizhu that Cui Meixi is her biological mother but Haizhu could not accept the fact. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)如莉告知道治处了海珠之外，智媛还有一个女儿当下落不明。道英透露给海珠崔美熙是她的亲生母亲，海珠无法接受事实。.

programme.title: 看见你的声音 I Can See Your Voice - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) "I Can See Your Voice" is a reality show in which guests must attempt to determine whether the contestant is a skilled vocalist or a tone-deaf contestant without hearing them sing. (重)《看見你的声音》是一档嘉宾凭视觉判断选手是否专业演唱实力还是音痴的新概念推理类音乐综艺节目。.

programme.title: 加文纳桥的约定 Love At Cavenagh Bridge - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Every dawn and dusk, Wei Guang, an old man in his seventies, will come to the Cavenagh Bridge and stand there waiting. This is the place where he first met his first and only love, Hui Yi. Hui Yi was from a rich family and Wei Guang was just a poor chap. Their love was forbidden by her parents and they were forced to break up. They decided to elope and used a riddle as the clue to their rendezvous point. Dan, Mie and Juliana are avid cyclists who met on Cavenagh Bridge and became buddies. Dan fell in love at first sight with Juliana, Mie holds a torch for Dan, and Juliana flirts with Mie all the time. One day, Dan challenged Juliana to a race, and the loser must agree to one request from the winner. Mie suddenly disappeared before the race, and resurfaced with a brand new look after the race, which throws this threesome into a new form of love triangle... (重)每天清晨和傍晚，七旬老翁伟光都会来到加纹纳桥上，呆呆伫立桥中央，似乎在等着什么人。他到底在等谁？这个人会不会再出现？原来，同样在这座桥上，他邂逅了他的初恋情人，也是唯一情人，慧仪。可是，慧仪是千金小姐，所以两人被女方的父亲棒打鸳鸯，被迫分离。两人毅然决定私奔，并且利用一道灯谜来互通会合地点……偏偏伟光没有能够参透灯谜，等到他揭开谜底的时候，慧仪早已经被父亲送走。五十年来，伟光就每天都回来桥上，希望有一天，慧仪真的能出现，履行承诺…… 阿丹和小米、茱莲娜因为骑车在桥上相遇，很快成为无所不谈的朋友。阿丹对茱莲娜一见钟情，小米对阿丹刻骨铭心，茱莲娜却和小米暧昧不断。有一天，阿丹决定约茱莲娜比赛，只要谁赢了，就能要求对方做一件事情。小米却在比赛前就人间蒸发，等到比赛完毕后，才以全新的姿态出现，把三角关系“复杂明朗化"…….

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 4

programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)Aidan万念俱灰自杀，却进入迷离境界见到老太婆。老太婆告诉他，大话精的生死由不得他，而是在她手中。Aidan气煞对德华撒谎说他不再是大话精，也不是谎言侦察机！Aidan对德华测试了几个谎言，确定了他再没有使谎话成真的能力，也不再是谎言侦察机后。次晨Aidan醒来，发现自己心情出奇的好，也看不见大家头顶上的数目字。到了公司，Aidan见到美琪便无法自拔地被她吸引，Nadia以为Aidan是故意要刺激她。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 2

Why do people go missing in Taiwan? (重)每一名失踪人口，代表一个破碎家庭。根据台湾警政署资料统计，台湾平均每年通报受理将近2万5千起失踪人口，两百多具无名尸体被发现的案例。茫茫人海，寻人好比大海捞针，怎么可能容易？.

(重)《爷爷的路》的目的是发现更多以开国元勋和先锋而命名的马路。通过深入采访他们的子孙后裔、录像档案、演出和口述，让我们对国家的历史以及建国功臣们有更加深入的了解。.
